name: MarZ: Tactical Base Defense
description: Build your defense base to fight back the undead hordes of Mars and secure the future of the red planet. MarZ is a game of strategy and tactical defense where you must carefully manage your crew and resources as you try to uncover the terrible secrets of the undead.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compliant graphics card with 6GB dedicated memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: any
